entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 23.
